Known Usage Locations
  • Within global complexTypes (3):
    ParameterType [ref], RepresentedVariableType [ref], VariableRepresentationType [ref]
  • As head element of substitution group affiliations (4):
    DateTimeRepresentationReference, NumericRepresentationReference, ScaleRepresentationReference, TextRepresentationReference
Annotation
Substitution group head for referencing Managed representations for use as a ValueRepresentation in a variable. TypeOfObject should be set to ManagedDateTimeRepresentation, ManagedNumericRepresentation, ManagedScaleRepresentation, or ManagedTextRepresentation.
